
// AUTO-GENERATED by camel-package-maven-plugin - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
= camel cmd route-structure

Dump Camel route structure


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel cmd route-structure [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--brief` | To show less detailed route structure |  | boolean
| `--filter` | Filter route by filename or route id (multiple names can be separated by comma) |  | String
| `--raw` | To output raw without metadata |  | boolean
| `--sort` | Sort route by name or id | name | String
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
